SERIES
The PROFIT
System
The wonderful fable of the Goose that Laid the
Golden Eggs supplies the springboard for this
sprightly lesson on the American profit system. The
Socialists and Communists, and their dupes, talk
against the profit motive; and yet they are them¬
selves utilizing the motive in everything they do.
Their classic fallacies about business profits are
exposed. With three-dimensional tools. Dr. Ganus
breaks down the national income to determine
where it goes; analyzes corporation profits in re¬
lationship to sales; and takes an actual sales dollar
out of the annual statement of a well-known meat
packing company and divides it up to show how
many pennies went for raw materials, for wages,
salaries and employee benefits; for shipping costs
and supplies; for taxes and plant maintenance; and
how many were left to pay dividends and to plow
back into the business. Less than one penny of net
profit out of each sales dollar!
Above: Professor Ganus nips corpora¬
tion profits from the national income
and traces it to its destination and
function. Left: the goose that laid
the golden eggs, and its unfortunate
experience, is a lesson applicable
today; Ibelowl the class gets to
guess the profit percentage on sales.
